list.name: Changes
list.comment: chore: bump all protocol versions to 2.0.12

task.summary:
Built an ALNP scaffold on top of the existing sACN codebase while leaving the transport untouched, adding an authenticated control-plane, message schema, and Rust reference code plus docs.
- Added ALNP Rust crate with handshake/session/crypto/stream scaffolding and public entrypoint alnp::AlnpSession (bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/Cargo.toml, bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/src/lib.rs, bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/src/handshake/{mod.rs,client.rs,server.rs}, bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/src/ session/mod.rs, bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/src/crypto/mod.rs, bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/src/stream.rs). - Defined E1.33-inspired handshake messages and proto schema (bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/src/messages/mod.rs, bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/messages/alnp_handshake.proto), including ControllerHello/NodeHello/ChallengeRequest/ChallengeResponse/SessionEstablished. - Documented protocol and project direction (SPEC.md, roadmap.md, bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/README.md), and highlighted ALNP additions in the root README.md. - Implemented ALNP-Stream wrapper that gates sACN send/subscribe calls on session authentication (bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/src/stream.rs), with placeholder key exchange/authenticator hooks ready for real crypto/TLS.

Built an ALNP scaffold on top of the existing sACN codebase while leaving the transport untouched, adding an authenticated control-plane, message schema, and Rust reference code plus docs.
- Added ALNP Rust crate with handshake/session/crypto/stream scaffolding and public entrypoint alnp::AlnpSession (bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/Cargo.toml, bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/src/lib.rs, bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/src/handshake/{mod.rs,client.rs,server.rs}, bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/src/ session/mod.rs, bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/src/crypto/mod.rs, bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/src/stream.rs). - Defined E1.33-inspired handshake messages and proto schema (bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/src/messages/mod.rs, bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/messages/alnp_handshake.proto), including ControllerHello/NodeHello/ChallengeRequest/ChallengeResponse/SessionEstablished. - Documented protocol and project direction (SPEC.md, roadmap.md, bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/README.md), and highlighted ALNP additions in the root README.md. - Implemented ALNP-Stream wrapper that gates sACN send/subscribe calls on session authentication (bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/src/stream.rs), with placeholder key exchange/authenticator hooks ready for real crypto/TLS.
Added control-plane signing/verification, refined reliability, and public-facing APIs/bindings scaffolds

ALNP repo is now cleaned, documented, versioned, and release-ready with multi-language builds and publishing pipelines.
- Removed legacy sACN/ETCLabs artifacts (cmake, docs, tools, examples, include/src/sacn, CI) leaving only ALNP v1 content and bindings. - Added full docs set (docs/*.md, SPEC.md, refreshed README.md, roadmap.md) covering overview, architecture, handshake/control messages, streaming/jitter, discovery, bindings, and public-facing examples across Rust/TS/Python/C. - Versioning/release infra: VERSION (1.0.0), CHANGELOG.md, .gitattributes, updated .gitignore, Rust crate 1.0.0 with staticlib output. - Build scripts (scripts/build_{rust,ts,python,c}.sh) producing artifacts under dist/ using VERSION metadata. - Multi-language release workflows under .github/workflows/ for Rust crate, TS package, Python wheel, and C tarball with tests, artifacts, and release notes on tags. - Public bindings packaged: TS package metadata updated, Python stub package (bindings/python), C header README, examples for all languages. - Control crypto helpers added, reliable control channel tweaks, and tests updated; cargo test now passes.

Added extensive E2E and performance tests for ALNP handshake, control, and streaming.
- Introduced a comprehensive suite of E2E tests covering control-plane reliability, reordering, retransmission, handshake scenarios (success/replay/signature validation/failures), and streaming. - Added performance tests for latency, keepalive stability, mixed conditions, streaming load, and universe capacity. - Enhanced test infrastructure with mock UDP, stream, and custom assertion utilities. - Updated `.gitignore` and `.idea` for development artifacts.

Refactored and expanded documentation, renamed protocol to ALPINE, and finalized v1.0 spec.
- Rebranded protocol and documentation from ALNP to ALPINE, aligning terminology across all files. - Removed legacy content (`bindings.md, overview.md, bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/README.md`) and introduced new protocol documents (`discovery.md, handshake.md, architecture.md, streaming.md, control_plane.md, capabilities.md, security.md, errors.md`). - Updated `README.md` with ALPINE overview and language binding highlights. - Consolidated ALPINE 1.0 wire protocol details into a rewritten `SPEC.md`. - Added IntelliJ project settings and quality-of-life updates for `.idea/`. - Enhanced modularity and clarity across subsystem-focused docs (discovery, handshake, streaming, and control plane).
Removed all test code, utilities, and performance benchmarks related to ALNP.

Added ALPINE benchmarks and E2E tests.
- Introduced `benchmarks.md` outlining methodology and metrics for streaming latency and protocol evaluations. - Added Criterion-based performance benchmarks for ALPINE, Art-Net, and sACN under `benches/`. - Implemented E2E UDP tests for streaming layer with `streaming_udp_e2e.rs`. - Modularized test utilities and shared config under `benches/common/`. - Updated ALPINE documentation to reflect benchmark results and methodology.
Refactor and optimize GitHub Actions workflows, update rustc info, and fix shell script compatibility.
Refactor GitHub Actions workflow, adjust Python artifact handling, and fix C++ discovery request logic.
Refactor Python release workflow: rename job, adjust permissions, streamline steps, and use OIDC for PyPI publishing.
chore: bump all protocol versions to 2.0.11
chore: bump all protocol versions to 2.0.12

MESSAGE.value:
Built an ALNP scaffold on top of the existing sACN codebase while leaving the transport untouched, adding an authenticated control-plane, message schema, and Rust reference code plus docs.
- Added ALNP Rust crate with handshake/session/crypto/stream scaffolding and public entrypoint alnp::AlnpSession (bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/Cargo.toml, bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/src/lib.rs, bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/src/handshake/{mod.rs,client.rs,server.rs}, bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/src/ session/mod.rs, bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/src/crypto/mod.rs, bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/src/stream.rs). - Defined E1.33-inspired handshake messages and proto schema (bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/src/messages/mod.rs, bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/messages/alnp_handshake.proto), including ControllerHello/NodeHello/ChallengeRequest/ChallengeResponse/SessionEstablished. - Documented protocol and project direction (SPEC.md, roadmap.md, bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/README.md), and highlighted ALNP additions in the root README.md. - Implemented ALNP-Stream wrapper that gates sACN send/subscribe calls on session authentication (bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/src/stream.rs), with placeholder key exchange/authenticator hooks ready for real crypto/TLS.
Added control-plane signing/verification, refined reliability, and public-facing APIs/bindings scaffolds

ALNP repo is now cleaned, documented, versioned, and release-ready with multi-language builds and publishing pipelines.
- Removed legacy sACN/ETCLabs artifacts (cmake, docs, tools, examples, include/src/sacn, CI) leaving only ALNP v1 content and bindings. - Added full docs set (docs/*.md, SPEC.md, refreshed README.md, roadmap.md) covering overview, architecture, handshake/control messages, streaming/jitter, discovery, bindings, and public-facing examples across Rust/TS/Python/C. - Versioning/release infra: VERSION (1.0.0), CHANGELOG.md, .gitattributes, updated .gitignore, Rust crate 1.0.0 with staticlib output. - Build scripts (scripts/build_{rust,ts,python,c}.sh) producing artifacts under dist/ using VERSION metadata. - Multi-language release workflows under .github/workflows/ for Rust crate, TS package, Python wheel, and C tarball with tests, artifacts, and release notes on tags. - Public bindings packaged: TS package metadata updated, Python stub package (bindings/python), C header README, examples for all languages. - Control crypto helpers added, reliable control channel tweaks, and tests updated; cargo test now passes.

Added extensive E2E and performance tests for ALNP handshake, control, and streaming.
- Introduced a comprehensive suite of E2E tests covering control-plane reliability, reordering, retransmission, handshake scenarios (success/replay/signature validation/failures), and streaming. - Added performance tests for latency, keepalive stability, mixed conditions, streaming load, and universe capacity. - Enhanced test infrastructure with mock UDP, stream, and custom assertion utilities. - Updated `.gitignore` and `.idea` for development artifacts.

Refactored and expanded documentation, renamed protocol to ALPINE, and finalized v1.0 spec.
- Rebranded protocol and documentation from ALNP to ALPINE, aligning terminology across all files. - Removed legacy content (`bindings.md, overview.md, bindings/rust/alpine-protocol-rs/README.md`) and introduced new protocol documents (`discovery.md, handshake.md, architecture.md, streaming.md, control_plane.md, capabilities.md, security.md, errors.md`). - Updated `README.md` with ALPINE overview and language binding highlights. - Consolidated ALPINE 1.0 wire protocol details into a rewritten `SPEC.md`. - Added IntelliJ project settings and quality-of-life updates for `.idea/`. - Enhanced modularity and clarity across subsystem-focused docs (discovery, handshake, streaming, and control plane).
Removed all test code, utilities, and performance benchmarks related to ALNP.

Added ALPINE benchmarks and E2E tests.
- Introduced `benchmarks.md` outlining methodology and metrics for streaming latency and protocol evaluations. - Added Criterion-based performance benchmarks for ALPINE, Art-Net, and sACN under `benches/`. - Implemented E2E UDP tests for streaming layer with `streaming_udp_e2e.rs`. - Modularized test utilities and shared config under `benches/common/`. - Updated ALPINE documentation to reflect benchmark results and methodology.
Expand roadmap with detailed ALPINE protocol phases
Add `Debug` trait to core structs for better traceability
Refactor and optimize GitHub Actions workflows, update rustc info, and fix shell script compatibility.
Refactor GitHub Actions workflow, adjust Python artifact handling, and fix C++ discovery request logic.
Refactor Python release workflow: rename job, adjust permissions, streamline steps, and use OIDC for PyPI publishing.
chore: bump all protocol versions to 2.0.11
chore: bump all protocol versions to 2.0.12

option.value: chore: bump all protocol versions to 2.0.12
